# Beginner: Add a short comment header to `src/app/page.js`

Description
--
Add a brief comment at the top of `src/app/page.js` describing the purpose of the file and the main sections (header, hero, schedule, speakers, footer). Keep it 2-3 lines.

Acceptance criteria
--
- `src/app/page.js` has a small comment block at the top explaining the file structure.
- The code runs without modification beyond the comment.

Notes
--
- This helps newcomers navigate the codebase and is safe to apply.
